title: Fillet of salmon with fennel and potato mash and red wine vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 tbsp chopped fennel leaves, from the top of the fennel bulbs
salt and freshly ground black pepper
400g/14oz floury potato (such as King Edwards), peeled, chopped
750g/1lb10oz fennel bulb, trimmed and roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
